JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Butcher jobs available now in Horsens
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Type of employment: permanent
Location: 7100 Vejle
Starting date: as soon as possible

Job description
25 skilled and experienced butchers needed in Vejle, Denmark. Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by sending their application or calling +45 88448244 during our office hours: Monday-Thursday 9:00-15:00 and Friday 9:00-13:00.

Job duties and responsibilities

  • Slaughtering: Working on the slaughter line, performing humane stunning and slaughtering of pigs.

  • Carving and Deboning: Skilled cutting and deboning of pork carcasses, separating primal cuts and preparing them for further processing.

  • Trimming: Trimming excess fat and removing any imperfections to ensure high-quality meat.

  • Knife Handling: Expert use of knives and other cutting tools to perform tasks efficiently and safely.

  • Hygiene and Safety: Maintaining the highest standards of hygiene and adhering to all safety regulations in the workplace.

  • Teamwork: Working effectively as part of a team to meet production targets.

Job requirements

  • Experience: At least 1-2 years of proven experience in a similar role, with specific skills in carving, deboning, and working in a slaughtering department.

  • Knife Skills: Excellent knife handling skills and precision cutting techniques.

  • Physical Fitness: The job requires physical strength and stamina to handle heavy carcasses and perform repetitive tasks.

  • Attention to Detail: Ability to work accurately and efficiently while maintaining high quality standards.

  • English skills: medium level required

Qualifications

  • Driver's license not required, but it can be an advantage 

Salary and benefits

  • Hourly gross salary: starting from 166 kr. - 175 kr./hour.

  • Accommodation and transportation to work: provided if needed.

  • Eurojob Denmark may provide assistance for registration to SIRI, SKAT, BorgerService, and all the other authorities, free of charge.
